Companies House Director Declines
Request to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}
A director has declined to sign the application to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}({!Transaction__c.CompanyNumber__c}) whose registered office address is {!Transaction__c.CompanyAddress1__c} {!Transaction__c.CompanyPostCode__c} and the application has been cancelled as a result. Your reference number for any future enquiries is FE{!Transaction__c.Id}.
The process to close the company has now stopped and the company will be not removed from the register.
What happens next
If you still wish to close the company, you'll need to submit a new application.
Submit a new application to close.
Contact Centre tel +44 (0)303 1234 500 or email enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk.
